text:
Newest Minnesota Hampton Inn by Hilton Opens in Bloomington
Hilton Worldwide announced the opening of Hampton Inn by Hilton Bloomington West, its newest property to join Hampton by Hilton, the global brand of more than 2,000 mid-priced Hampton Inn by Hilton, Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton and Hampton by Hilton hotels. The 100-room hotel, located at 5400 American Blvd. West, is managed by TPI Hospitality.
Located just off of I-494 and minutes from south Minneapolis, Hampton Inn by Hilton Bloomington West is near the Minneapolis-Saint Paul International Airport and the world famous Mall of America. The city is also home to Hyland Lake Park Reserve and the Minnesota Valley National Wildlife Refuge.
“We are excited to welcome guests to our new location to explore the many offerings of the city of Bloomington,” said Sarah Purcell, general manager. “With our accommodating staff, we are ready to help guests enjoy their stay in our city, whether it’s business or leisure.”
Hampton Inn by Hilton Bloomington West offers amenities, such as free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour business center with complimentary printing, a 480 square foot meeting space that can accommodate up to 40 people and a fitness center. Guests can take advantage of the location’s free shuttle service to local businesses, airport, and mall. The hotel also provides free On the House hot breakfast as well as Hampton’s On the RunTM Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday.
The new hotel features the Perfect Mix Lobby, designed as an extension of the guestroom with a variety of seating and lighting options for both leisure and business travelers. Additionally, the hotel features TREATS, a new food and beverage shop filled with snacks, toiletries, local merchandise and drinks for purchase. Guestrooms are equipped with the brand’s signature Clean and fresh Hampton bed®, flat-screen LCD TV, microwave, fridge and coffeemaker.
Hampton by Hilton team members proudly exhibit a unique culture described as Hamptonality. This term describes each hotel’s approach to friendly customer service and anticipation of guests’ needs and providing travelers with helpful suggestions about area attractions, historical facts and fun things to do around town. Additionally, hotels are infused with local photography and artwork, highlighting each property’s connection and support to its own community.
Source:- Hilton Worldwide
